title: FS: 9 Graded Tolstoi, EPDG, Cycle--New Price Cuts
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: FS: 9 Graded Tolstoi, EPDG, Cycle--New Price Cuts
posts.post_content:
Offering FS now  13 fine t206s with “scarce” backs --all  with new price cuts.  See scans below.  Nearly all have great centering and most have none or very few higher in the pop reports.  I’ve included most of the scans but will send others on request.  Thanks.   $6 shipping for cards over $300 to partly cover insurance.

Donlin SGC 50 EPDG (none higher SGC or PSA) (seated variation) $199
Carrigan PSA 5 Tolstoi  (none higher PSA or SGC)  $349 
Krause  PSA 4 Tolstoi  (none higher PSA or SGC) $329
Meyers SGC 60 Cycle (none higher PSA or SGC)  $429  (batting variation) 
Camnitz  SGC 60 Tolstoi (none higher SGC, one PSA 5 but none higher)  $279 (hand at side)
Huggins  PSA 3  Tolstoi (only one PSA higher)  $279  (hands to mouth)
Wright  SGC 55  EPDG (only one higher SGC, none higher PSA)  $209
Schulte  SGC 40 Sovereign 460  (one higher)  $109   (back view)
Brashear  SGC 50  EPDG (only one higher SGC)  $159
